body: I've played around with the _Apply OS Measure component--I was excited to see you guys working on it--but haven't been able to get it to run without crashing Rhino. I was attempting to apply the "Add Daylight Sensor at the Center of Spaces with a Specified Space Type Assigned" measure I dl'd from the BCL. I will keep me eyes on the progress, and let me know if I can be any help testing!
